author: publisher12
title: GMCH Chandigarh Recruitment 2017 – MSW, Lecturer & Other Posts

organizations.name: recruitment advt & application form gmch chandigarh recruitment
government rehabilitation institute for intellectual disabilities

text: 1. Medical Social Worker: 01 Post 2. Data Entry Operator Grade-A: 01 Post 3. Clinical Psychologist: 01 Post 4. Audiologist: 01 Post   possess Master Degree in Social Work or B.Sc from recognized university with two years diploma work for S.No-1, Degree of recognized university or equivalent, speed of not less than 8000 key depression per hour for data entry work with 90 % accurancy for S.No-2, Master degree in psychology with experimental psychology or Ph.D degree in Clinical Psychology for S.No-3 & B.Sc (Speech & Hearing/ Audiology and Speech therapy) for S.No-4. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application in the prescribed format to Department of Pediatrics, Level-IV, Block-D, GMCH-32, Chandigarh on or before 31-01-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application: 31-01-2017.   duration, salary, qualification, experience   below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form GMCH Chandigarh Recruitment 2017 – Lecturer Posts: Government Medical College & Hospital (GMCH), Chandigarh has published   Lecturer vacancies on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 08-02-2017 up to 05:00 P.M. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee   below…. GMCH Chandigarh Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Lecturer Age Limit: Candidates upper age limit should be 45 years as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation is applicable as per Rules.   posses Master Degree in any discipline with not less than 50% of marks and M.Ed Degree in Specific Disability (Mental Retardation/ Intellectual Disability) area with not less than 55% marks or an equivalent grade B+ in 10 point scale or an equivalent Degree from a foreign University recognised by RCI and Valid registration with RCI under Section 19 of Act 1992 with relevant experience. Selection Process : Candidates will be selected based on interview. Application Fee : Candidates should pay Rs. 100/- by bank draft in favour of the Director, Government Rehabilitation Institute for Intellectual Disabilities, Sector – 31 payable at Chandigarh. How to Apply : Eligible candidates may send their application in prescribed format with 01 photograph pasted on the application along with self attested copies of certificates and testimonials in proof of educational qualification, date of birth, experience, caste certificate etc and fee in an envelope should be super scribed with “Application for the Post of Lecturer (On Contract basis)” to the Office of Joint Director, Government Rehabilitation Institute for Intellectual Disabilities, Aashadeep Building, Sector 31 – C, Chandigarh on or before 08-02-2017 up to 05:00 P.M. Last Date for Receipt of Application: 08-02-2017 up to 05:00 P.M.   salary, experience, tenure, reservation, terms and conditions   below….
